title: Site Acceptance Test Report
description: Generates the SAT metric performance attributes

attributes.description: ID of the Sequel or RSII instrument on which the data were collected
attributes.name: Instrument ID

attributes.description: Percentage of the genome for which consensus bases were called
attributes.name: Genome Coverage

attributes.description: Percent concordance of the consensus sequence versus the reference
attributes.name: Consensus Concordance

attributes.description: The approximate mean length of polymerase reads that mapped to the reference sequence (including adapters and other unmapped regions)
attributes.name: Polymerase Read Length Mean (mapped)

attributes.description: Number of polymerase reads that could be mapped to the reference genome
attributes.name: Number of Polymerase Reads (mapped)
